resources.string: The following animation was designed to help you relax.
Inhale with your nose and exhale with your mouth.
We will provide you with tips and quotes to help you through your day. You are never alone.

string-array.name: happy_quote_list
string-array.item: The scariest thing is setting your goals too low and meeting them. -Georges Saint Pierre
fgdfgdfgdfg
Tjhjhjhjhjhjhjhjhjle

string-array.name: scared_quote_list
string-array.item: The scariest thing is setting your goals too low and meeting them. -Georges Saint Pierre

string-array.name: angry_quote_list
string-array.item: The scariest thing is setting your goals too low and meeting them. -Georges Saint Pierre

string-array.name: nervous_quote_list
string-array.item: The scariest thing is setting your goals too low and meeting them. -Georges Saint Pierre

string-array.name: sad_quote_list
string-array.item: The purpose of life is to be defeated by greater and greater things.
"Don't cry because it\'s over, smile because it happened." ― Dr. Seuss
"You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness." ― Jonathan Safran Foer
"Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart." ― José N. Harris, MI VIDA: A Story of Faith, Hope and Love
"Be strong, because things will get better. It may> be stormy now, but it never rains forever.
"Nothing can cure the soul but the senses, just as nothing can cure the senses but the soul." ― Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray
Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will. -James Stephens
"Sad? Depressed? Heartbroken? Feeling like world\'s going to end tomorrow? No worries, there’s a Taylor Swift song for that"
"Whenever you feel sad, just remember that there\'s someone in the world who is pulling a door that says push."
"Take a step and breathe. It\'s a bad day, not a bad life."
"Ice cream does wonders for a heavy heart. Frozen yogurt is probably healthier though."
Here\'s a joke: They all laughed when I said I wanted to be a comedian. Well, they\'re not laughing now
Everytime I\'m sad, I imagine a T-Rex trying to put a hat on.
"Exercise is good for your body and mind. Nudge nudge, wink wink."
May the Force be with you. And the Happiness. And the Love.
Every human walks around with a certain kind of sadness. They may not wear it on their sleeves, but it\'s there if you look deep. -Taraji P. Henson
Fear is only as deep as the mind allows. -Japanese Proverb
Take baby steps, Rome wasn\'t built in a day.
Make sure you get enough sleep. If you can\'t, coffee helps too.
Pain is inevitable, but suffering is optional.
Healing doesn\'t mean you were never hurt, it means you no longer allow the hurt to control you.
When everything goes wrong and things seem to fall apart? When nobody believes in you and you feel so alone? This is the EXACT moment that you got to believe in yourself.
If you can\'t fly, then run, if you can\'t run, then walk, if you can\'’t walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones that do.
